data.eml:eml: Description of two species in the alpheid shrimp genus Athanas Leach, 1814, with remarks on A. amazone Holthuis, 1951 (Decapoda, Caridea)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Anker, Arthur, Ahyong, Shane T. (2007): Description of two species in the alpheid shrimp genus Athanas Leach, 1814, with remarks on A. amazone Holthuis, 1951 (Decapoda, Caridea). Zootaxa 1563: 17-30, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.178383
